sentences.en: A diet deficient in vitamin D may cause the disease rickets.
sentences.cn: 缺少维生素D的饮食可能导致软骨病.

sentences.en: Adequate vitamin D prevents the development of bone diseases such as rickets, osteomalacia and osteoporosis.
sentences.cn: 充足的维生素D可预防形成骨骼疾病，例如佝偻病、骨软化和骨质疏松。

sentences.en: And it appears to do more then just protect against ( weakens ) rickets.
sentences.cn: 看来维他命D不仅仅可以防止 软骨病.

sentences.en: Improved diet has been responsible for a dramatic decrease in rickets.
sentences.cn: 改良的食物使得佝偻病的发生有了戏剧性的减少.

sentences.en: It also appears to do more than just protect against rickets.
sentences.cn: 除了防止软骨病,它还有更多的功能.

sentences.en: Low level levels of vitamin D can lead to rickets and osteoporosis.
sentences.cn: 低水平的维他命D能导致像软骨病和骨质酥松症等疾病.

sentences.en: Objective : To discuss the relation of rickets and blood lead level.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨佝偻病的发病及治疗与血铅水平的关系.

sentences.en: Objective To understand the state and dangerous factors of infantile rickets.
sentences.cn: 目的了解青岛市四方区婴幼儿佝偻病患病的情况及影响因素.

sentences.en: Richs'dog may receive the milk that a poor child needs to avoid rickets.
sentences.cn: 富人的狗可以得到穷人的孩子为了避免软骨病而必须饮用的牛乳.

sentences.en: Ricketks Rickets is deformity , a deformity mainly found in children.
sentences.cn: 软骨病是一种发育畸形, 主要出现在孩子身上.

sentences.en: Rickets can cause and weakness, teeth problems and muscle loss.
sentences.cn: 还导致许多牙齿问题和肌肉萎缩.

sentences.en: Rickets can cause bone pain and weakness, teeth problems and muscle loss.
sentences.cn: 佝偻病会导致骨头疼痛疏松 、 牙齿问题和肌肉松弛.

sentences.en: Rickets is a deformity, mainly found in children.
sentences.cn: 软骨病是一种残疾, 主要被发现在小孩人群中.

sentences.en: Signs of deficiency would be rickets ( in children ), joint pain, bone deformities, poor growth.
sentences.cn: 不足的迹象,将佝偻病 ( 在儿童 ), 关节疼痛, 骨畸形, 穷人的增长.

sentences.en: Two children who began the study showing signs of rickets continuously chose high calcium foods, and actually "cured" themselves through their own, independent choice of foods.
sentences.cn: 研究中两个出现佝偻病迹象的儿童始终选择高钙食物，最终通过自主选择食物“治好”了自己的疾病。

sentences.en: Vitamin deficiency can cause ill nesses, eg scurvy, rickets.
sentences.cn: 缺乏维生素能引起疾病(如坏血病 、 佝偻病).

words.tran_cn: 摇晃的；虚弱的；患佝偻病的

trans.tran_en: a disease that children get in which their bones become soft and bent, caused by a lack of  vitamin  D
